rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual offer of equipment without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes an offer to distribute equipment ('said they have offered to distribute such equipment') without active reassurance.
